casebody.data:
C. F. HARMS COMPANY, Libelant-Appellee, v. CHIARELLO BROTHERS COMPANY, Respondent-Appellee; MT. VERNON BUILDERS’ SUPPLY COMPANY et al., Respondents-Appellants. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 23, 1928. No. 200. Horace L. Cheyney, of New York City, for appellants. Wm. E. Purdy and J. Newton Nash, both of New York City, for appellees.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed in open court. (No written opinion filed in court below.)
